body: Ok, where is @jamesob and what have you done to him.

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#24515](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/24515) (Only load BlockMan in BlockMan member functions by dongcarl)
* [#24456](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/24456) (blockman: Properly guard blockfile members by dongcarl)
* [#24232](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/24232) (assumeutxo: add init and completion logic by jamesob)
* [#24230](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/24230) (indexes: Stop using node internal types and locking cs_main, improve sync logic by ryanofsky)
* [#24220](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/24220) (validation: don't re-acquire cs_main during IBD in CChainState::IsInitialBlockDownload() by jonatack)
* [#24008](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/24008) (assumeutxo: net_processing changes by jamesob)
* [#23599](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23599) (Tidy up RPCTxSerializationFlags by MarcoFalke)
* [#23319](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23319) (rpc: Return fee and prevout (utxos) to getrawtransaction by dougEfresh)
* [#22564](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22564) (refactor: Move mutable globals cleared in `::UnloadBlockIndex` to `BlockManager` by dongcarl)
* [#19391](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19391) (RPC/Mining: Clean out pre-Segwit miner compatibility code by luke-jr)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
